body_html: Looks like tensorflow/python/training/coordinator_test.py failed :(. I think this is the same issue you fixed in saver_test.py (in ee50560) where time.sleep() doesn't sleep for long enough on Windows, and can lead to flakiness. Would it be easy to port the same solution?
body_text: Looks like tensorflow/python/training/coordinator_test.py failed :(. I think this is the same issue you fixed in saver_test.py (in ee50560) where time.sleep() doesn't sleep for long enough on Windows, and can lead to flakiness. Would it be easy to port the same solution?
body: Looks like tensorflow/python/training/coordinator_test.py failed :(. I think this is the same issue you fixed in `saver_test.py` (in ee50560b5fd2b1112e82377d7d094a0e6918f935) where `time.sleep()` doesn't sleep for long enough on Windows, and can lead to flakiness. Would it be easy to port the same solution?
